name: Bards Dispense Profanity
white_cards: a barber's chair that fits all buttocks

a boil,
a plague-sore,
an embossed carbuncle
a bolt of nothing, shot at nothing
a care-crazed mother of many children
a certain convocation of politic worms
a cock that nobody can match
a codpiece to stick pins on
a couch for luxury and damned incest
a dog as big as ten of yours
a double tongue; there's two tongues

a Dutchman today,

a Frenchman to-morrow
a father cruel, and a step-dame false
a gentleman and a gamester, sir
a German from the waist downward
a gross lout, a mindless slave, or else a hovering temporizer
a hand that kings have lipped
a hot-house, which, I think, is a very ill house too
a husband with a beard on his face
a jewel that too casually hath left mine arm
A Kate conformable as other household Kates
a kind of excellent dumb discourse
a king transformed to a gnat

a knack,
a toy,
a trick,
a baby's cap
a liberal rewarder of his friends
a piece of beef and mustard

a plentiful lack of wit,

together with most weak hams
a shrewd thrust at your belly
a tale told by an idiot
a tooth-picker from the furthest inch of Asia
a whole school of tongues in this belly of mine
a wonder, if you talk of a wonder
all kinds of sores and shames on my bare hand
all the pleasures of the world
an index obscure prologue to the history of lust and foul thoughts
an old trot with ne'er a tooth in her head

blubbering and weeping,

weeping and blubbering
eight wild-boars roasted whole at breakfast
fear and niceness -- the handmaids of all women
fighting o' days and foining o' nights
fingering, so; we'll try with tongue too
good strawberies in your garden there
grease that's sweaten from the murderer's gibbet
greater than great, great, great, great
groping for trouts in a peculiar river
he that hath killed my king and whored my mother

her C's,
her U's,
and her T's

her fine foot, straight leg, and quivering thigh

and the demesnes that there adjacent lie

here, sir!
here, sir!
here, sir!
here, sir!
honeying and making love over the nasty sty
how virgins might blow up men
longing, as I said, for prunes
making the beast with two backs
men whose heads do grow beneath their shoulders
my accursed womb, the bed of death!
my father with his bleeding rings

my house,
my household
stuff, my field,
my barn,
my horse,
my ox,
my ass,
my any thing
my knife in your mouldy chaps
my mellow hangings, nay, my leaves
my mother weeping, my father wailing, my sister crying, our maid howling, our cat wringing her hands

Nathaniel,
Joseph,
Nicholas,
Philip,
Walter,
Sugarsop
and the rest
no more brain than a stone
on her left breast, a mole
paddling in your neck with his damned fingers
scaring the ladies like a crow-keeper

sisters!
sisters!
shame of ladies!
sisters!
some natural notes about her body
such bugs and goblins in my life
talking with deceiving father of a deceitful son
ten thousand men that fishes gnawed upon
that great baby you see there
that Greekish whoremasterly villian with the sleeve
that oozy bed where my son lies
that same young Trojan ass that loves the whore there
the change of man and boy
the fellow with the great belly
the flower that's like thy face

the four,
or the three,
or the two
the French lord, Monsieur Le Bon
the frozen bosom of the north
the heat of a luxurious bed
the holes where eyes should be
the imminent death of twenty thousand men
the inaudible and noiseless foot of Time
the incestuous pleasure of his bed
the infections that the sun sucks up
the innocent mansion of my love
the lascivious pleasing of a lute
the loose encounters of lascivious men

the maiden's organ,
shrill and sound
the mere effusion of thy proper loins
the natural gates and alleys of the body
the ousel cock so black of hue
the owner of a foul disease
the pillow, there the bolster, this way the coverlet, another way the sheets

the pin-buttock,

the quatch-buttock,

the brawn buttock,

or any buttock
the pregnant hinges of the knee
the prettier fellow of the two
the rack of this tough world
the silliest stuff that ever I heard
the son and heir of a mongrel bitch
the strong and swelling evil of my conception
the sweetest morsel of the night
the thick rotundity o' the world!
the wall's hole, not your lips at all
the wronger of her and you
their numbed and mortified bare arms
those pampered animals that rage in savage sensuality

what have we here?

a man or a fish?
what o' clock I say it is
you, that did void your rheum upon my beard
your hands again upon my sword
your wives, your daughters, your matrons and your maids

black_cards.text: _____ is the new _____.
_____ guaranteed, or your money back!

[POINT TO ANY PLAYER.]

My friendship with this person is based entirely on _____.

[POINT TO THE PERSON TO YOUR LEFT.]

I have this person to thank for introducing me to _____.

[POINT TO THE PERSON TO YOUR LEFT.]

What is this person's guilty pleasure?

[POINT TO THE PERSON TO YOUR RIGHT.]

What does this person prefer in the bedroom?
A bird in the hand is worth _____.
A euphemism for the sex act that you would least like to discuss with your parents:

A horse!
a horse!
_____ for a horse!

A million dollars isn't cool.
You know what's cool? _____.
A rabbi, _____, and _____ walk into a bar.
A vote for Donald Trump is a vote to Make America _____ Again.
Absence makes the heart grow _____.
Actions speak louder than _____.
After the final book was published, J.K. Rowling confirmed that Dumbledore was _____.
After the show it's the afterparty, and after the party it's _____.
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely _____.
As everyone knows, after shooting Lincoln, John Wilkes Booth jumped onto the stage and yelled "_____,"
Ask not what your country can do for you; ask what you can do for _____.
Behind every successful man is _____.
By the age of four, male children already display a preference for _____.
Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste _____.
Creepiest ride ever: my Uber driver was _____.

DRILL SERGEANT:
What the hell are you doing, private?

PRIVATE:
Sir, _____, sir!
Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to _____.
For every $1 that men receive, women receive _____.
Give me liberty, or give me _____.
God helps those who help _____.
Good night, good night! _____ is such sweet sorrow.
History is written by _____.
How will I keep myself busy after I retire?
I believe it was Winston Churchill who said: "Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to _____."
I could never marry someone who supports banning _____.
I don't consider myself religious, but I do believe in _____.

I got my dog from a shelter.
She was rescued from _____.
I have a dream that one day this nation wil rise up and live out the true meaning of _____.
I love the smell of _____ in the morning
I majored in business, but I minored in _____.
I think, therefore I am _____.
I'll get you, my pretty, and _____ too!
I'm getting a degree in English. It's basically four years of _____.
I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking for _____.
I'm sorry, this table is reserved for _____.
I'm thinking about getting a lower-back tattoo of _____.
I've got _____ in low places.
If a creepy guy won't leave me alone at a bar, I just start talking about _____ until he leaves. Works every time.
If music be the food of _____, play on.
In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is _____.
It's always darkest before _____.
KEEP CALM AND CARRY _____
Key to a healthy marriage: _____.
Life is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying _____.
My high school diary has a BUNCH of entries about _____.
My road rage really gets out of control when the other driver is _____.

O say, does _____ yet wave

o'er the land of the fre and the home of the brave?
Oh yeah? Well I graduated from the University of _____!
On the twelfth day of Christmas, my true love gave to me _____.
One weird trick for beautiful, clear skin:
Our next speaker is a distinguished professor of _____ at the University of Chicago.
Pediatricians now recommend that all children receive each morning.
Plot twist: they were _____ the whole time!
PRINCE HARRY CAUGHT IN _____ SCANDAL
Romeo, Romeo! Wherefore art thou _____?

SCARLETT:
Where shall I go? What shall I do?

RHETT:
Frankly, my dear, I don't give _____.
Scholars have discovered a previously unknown Sherlock Holmes story called "The Adventure of _____."
Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have _____.
Some conspiracists belive that Shakespeare's plays were actually written by _____.

Thanks, everyone, for coming out tonight.
This next song is called "_____."
The course of _____ never did run smooth.
The eyes are windows to _____.

The latest Westboro Baptist Church sign:

GOD HATES _____.
The pen is mightier than _____.
The sign of true adult maturity:
There's a theory that Shakespeare was actually _____.
These days the kids are calling it "_____."

This year's trendiest card game:

"_____ Against _____."
Throw _____ in the air like you just don't care!
Title of a bestselling memoir later revealed to be fabricated:
Title of a film that's trying to win an Oscar:
To be, or not to be: that is _____.

Twas the night before Christmas, and all through the house,

not a creature was stirring, not even _____.
Ugh, I just sat through this dude mansplaining _____ to me for a half hour.
We'll be holding you in an isolation chamber until we can rule out _____ Syndrome.
Well, you know what they say: big hands, _____.
What defines my brand of feminism?
What if _____ is just, like, in your mind, you know?
What is this world coming to? I'll tell you what it's coming to:
What new trend has parents of teenagers worried?
What topic is glaringly absent from the Sex Ed curriculum?
What will finally bring our civilization to an end?
What's in a name? _____ by any other name would smell as sweet.
What's my ideal first date?
What's the sexiest thing ever?
When life gives you lemons, make _____.
When told that the people had no bread to eat, Marie Antoinette is said to have suggested: "Let them eat _____."
With my skills in _____, and your knowledge in _____, we could rule the world!
Yes, I have a question. Well, not so much a question as _____.

You:
Play Rediohead.

Siri:
Sorry. I don't know what "_____" means.

You're seeing a therapist for the first time. The therapist asks why you've come.

Your answer:
Your call is very important to us. Please stay on the line and we'll be _____.
